name: "The Flakes" Long-sleeved Tee
description: It's cold out here, stay cool with "The Flakes" Tee featuring three design locations on a long sleeved t-shirt. The left sleeve reads the Polar state of mind "Positive Outlook About Reality" in yellow. The left sleeve is lined in with several of Polar's unique logos past, present and future in red. It is all brought together with a The SnoPirate on front in grey outlined in blue.

name: "Team Tee" Safety Orange
description: The Team Tee features our unique Hockey Penguin logo on the front of the shirt to let you know we are game. The Tee is accented with two X's on the back to symbolize that we cant be defined as a number and wont fit into any stereotypes, with our signature POLAR logo over top.  Comes in Safety Green, Safety Pink and Safety Orange. Are you Team Polar?

name: "Team Tee" Safety Green
description: The Team Tee features our unique Hockey Penguin logo on the front of the shirt to let you know we are game. The Tee is accented with two X's on the back to symbolize that we cant be defined as a number and wont fit into any stereotypes, with our signature POLAR logo over top.  Comes in Safety Green, Safety Pink and Safety Orange. Are you Team Polar?

name: "Team Tee" White And Heather Gray
description:
The Team Tee features our unique Hockey Penguin logo on the front of the shirt to let you know we are game. The Tee is accented with two X's on the back to symbolize that we cant be defined as a number and wont fit into any stereotypes, with our signature POLAR logo over top. The Team tee is topped off with a TV and a plus sign inside symbolizing everything we are about, A Positive Outlook About Reality. Comes in White and Heather Gray. Are you Team Polar?



SIZE LARGE SOLD OUT IN BOTH WHITE & HEATHER GRAY

name: "The Penguins" Beanie
description:
It's cold this winter but you have got to stay cooool! Keep warm with this season our new double deluxe ribbed cuff beanie.
This beanie is super smooth for ladies and the fellas in black with pink/white/aqua lettering.
